name: BadaSoch
description:
How to Play:

1. Open the Zip. Click on executable.

2. Create a new account by adding your name and password.

3.  Then click Join Game.

Basics :

You have 6 resources which can be mined by Building Mine Extractors.

Each resources can be used to build new stuff like STAR, PLANETS etc.

In Ship Yard you can find new player and send stuff.

Project is still in prototype.

To  Save data please click on Save. If you LogOut data is saved.

If you find any BUG tell me  and if you want anything to be ADDED  or CHANGED tell me or if you need help in how to play ask in comments :)

Additional Info:

I made a Real Time Strategy Game, which is still need more addons and polishing.

Game starts as:

You are now given power to create and manage your own Universe :D

Your Home is an island in middle of Maya Ocean. Above you is the vast sky. Ocean and Sky both is to be explored. You find a way to create a material called “Prakriti” from Ocean by using Statue of Prakriti which is source for all other resources and creation of whole Universe.

Second Tab is Creator which is responsible for producing other resources. After getting Prakriti you god wiser and your wisdom told you that you can make 5 new resources by using Prakriti and this gave origin to Aakash, Agni, Vayu, Jal, Prithvi.

Then your wisdom has to be more greater so you need both Spiritual Wisdom and Material knowledge.

With the already gained resources you can create new Universe. Stars, Planets, Moons, Comets, Asteroids can be made.

But as you are thriving you need to help other to thrive by using Ships. You gained a wise idea how to convert your material to Ship which can help others to grow.

But the Maya Ocean is mysterious, some Forces are getting born and they want to destroy your Universe and rule it.

To defend and attack back you need your Soldiers. The current Basic Fighter is Astro Boy made from power of an Asteroid.

The Ocean is vast and more mystery is yet to be REVEALED…
